data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Large documents thus are made of pools of content objects, and students can use special software to integrate the content into a coherent whole. A ____ integration ____ to ____ a ____ structure, like a book, where ____ the ____ are ____, ____ in a sequence ____ pages, manipulated ____ a ____ processor. It ____ simple ____ images ____ be ____ in ____ a ____, ____ long ____ sizing ____ adjusted. However, large images, and other multimedia content (e.g., audio), must be integrated in a different fashion.
data.partBlankContent: Large documents thus are made of pools of content objects, and students can use special software to integrate the content into a coherent whole. A sim___ integration i_ to ha__ a lin___ structure, like a book, where a__ the compo_____ are ord____, a_ in a sequence o_ pages, manipulated b_ a wo__ processor. It i_ simple f__ images t_ be incl____ in su__ a wo__, a_ long a_ sizing i_ adjusted. However, large images, and other multimedia content (e.g., audio), must be integrated in a different fashion.
data.fullContent: Large documents thus are made of pools of content objects, and students can use special software to integrate the content into a coherent whole. A simple integration is to have a linear structure, like a book, where all the components are ordered, as in a sequence of pages, manipulated by a word processor. It is simple for images to be included in such a work, as long as sizing is adjusted. However, large images, and other multimedia content (e.g., audio), must be integrated in a different fashion.
data.answer: 因此，大型文档是由内容对象库组成的，学生可以使用特殊的软件将内容集成为一个连贯的整体。一个简单的集成拥有一个线性结构，就像一本书，其中所有的组件都是有序的，就像在一个页面序列中一样，由文字处理器进行操作。只要调整尺寸，将图像包含在这样的作品中是很简单的。但是，大图像和其他多媒体内容(如音频)必须以不同的方式集成。
